General.Name: Guangxi Guitang Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Yuegui Guangye Holdings Co., Ltd. manufactures and sell sugar, paper, pulp, organic-inorganic compound, and organic fertilizers in China. The company offers white sugar, brown sugar, paper pulp, writing paper, tissue paper, sulfuric acid, reagent acid, iron ore powder, and phosphate fertilizer. It provides its products under the Osmanthus brands. The company was formerly known as Guangxi Guitang (Group) Co., Ltd. Guangxi Yuegui Guangye Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Guigang, China.
